description: requests bids for Multiple Victoria-Class spares.
full_summary:
===============

**Multiple Victoria-Class Spares Tender**

The Department of National Defence intends to procure various spare parts for the Victoria-Class vessels. This tender announcement outlines the required components and delivery details.

**Description of Requirements**
---------------------------

* Master Unit Cased (6 units): NSN 99-5370548, Part No. 617-1-03303-000, NCAGE K1071
	+ To be delivered to HMCS Ottawa (Esquimalt)
* Master Unit Uncased (9 units): NSN 99-5370549, Part No. 617-1-03412-000, NCAGE K1071
	+ To be delivered to HMCS Charlevoix (Halifax)
* Circuit Card Assembly (35 units): NSN 99-5370561, Part No. 007014979, NCAGE K2516
	+ To be delivered to HMCS Ottawa (Esquimalt)
* Circuit Card Assembly (20 units): NSN 99-5370561, Part No. 007014979, NCAGE K2516
	+ To be delivered to HMCS Charlevoix (Halifax)
* Connector (3 units): NSN 99-4647132, Part No. 254041/560, NCAGE U4290
	+ To be delivered to HMCS Ottawa (Halifax)
* Antenna (7 units): NSN 99-7729188, Part No. A1/254041/060, NCAGE K3902/U4535/KC5J5
	+ To be delivered to HMCS Ottawa (Esquimalt) and HMCS Charlevoix (Halifax)
* Cable Assembly Radio Frequency (8 units): NSN 99-7729190, Part No. AHC335, NCAGE K8677/U4535/K3902
	+ To be delivered to HMCS Ottawa (Esquimalt) and HMCS Charlevoix (Halifax)

**Tender Requirements and Selection Criteria**
---------------------------------------

This procurement is subject to the Controlled Goods Program. Suppliers must ensure that their products meet the required specifications and are compliant with Canadian export controls. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

Bidder selection will be based on the price and quality of the proposed products. Suppliers are encouraged to provide Equivalent or Substitute Products, which must be clearly identified as such.

**Tender Documents and Contact Information**
-----------------------------------------

The
